title: Bug 2272Copy & Move should be disabled when closed (1GEHVNK)
description: It is not possible to copy or move a project when it is closed, so the commands should be disabled.Steps:1) create a new project2) in the Navigator, right click on the project and click 'Close Project'3) right click on the project and click 'Copy Project'4) enter a new name and click OKThe workbench will not allow this action, so the menu item should be disabled for this item, or it should be allowed.NOTES:
